home.homeHeading: Standout Your Business With Our Outstanding Outsourcing
home.homeDesc: Get seamless high quality business services at reasonable charges!

homeAbout.homeAboutDescription: Infolks group is a fast growing outsourcing company and the No.1 data labelling company in India. We function with a team of around 350 employees to meet your business requirements that can help you achieve your actual organizational goals. As an outsourcing expert, we provide services in various business sectors. Our ability to integrate diversification in resources to meet market demands enables us to ensure quality and cost-efficient services at any time. Being innovative and technologically motivated, we aim at supporting organizations that power-up future technologies like Computer Vision & Machine Learning. Hence, data labelling is our most featured service.

homeMissionVision.homeMissionDescription: “To enable rural development through employment generation, environmental growth, and balanced regional development.”
homeMissionVision.homeVisionDescription: “To enable effective outsourcing at the most reasonable cost.”

homeOurTeam.homeOurTeamDescription: Talent wins games, but teamwork and intelligence wins championships. Our team is what that makes us proud! They set the tone of our successful journey, a unique combination of talent and bold vision for the future. Meet the leaders behind our success!

about.aboutShortDescription: A leading outsourcing company specialized in data labelling services.
about.aboutDescription1: Journey of Infolks began in 2016 as the only image annotation company in the state. The idea of such a venture was formulated by a trio considering their expertise and experience in the niche. Started off with a 7-member team, the first workspace was set up temporarily at the ancestral home of one of the directors. Team strength leveraged quickly over a count of 20+ employees marking the official beginning of Infolks. By the end of 2016, a team of qualified annotators were moulded and the team was still counting. When the team count exceeded a count of 70 we shifted our workspace from the ancestral home to our well set up office structure.
about.aboutDescription2: As time went on more young workforce kept on joining our cause and within a span of 1 year we could expand our team to a count of 150+ employees. By the time, our qualified annotators were not only well versed in image annotation but also in other data labelling services. This was the moment for us to think something big and diverse and decided to enable multiple outsourcing services. By the end of 3rd successful year we extended our workspace including more infrastructure. Today Infolks is an ISO certified company outsourcing services with a team of around 250 employees. Data labelling and outstaffing are our featured services. So far we have worked with numerous Fortune 10 and Fortune 100 companies. CONTINENTAL AG is one of the recent additions in our list. We have collaborated with them to set up a fully functional Offshore Dedicated Center.

timeline1.timelineDescription: No business is born huge and comes up from small victories. Starting off with a seven-member team, introduced annotation services in the state. Being a beginner in this field the hurdles ahead were plenty.

timeline2.timelineDescription: Moving past the incubation period marked our official and legal beginning towards encountering new possibilities. Our workforce leveraged to a count of 20+ employees along with building the best management team. We started the journey towards our expected goal.

timeline3.timelineDescription: It  is a stage of transition from one to the other. Our workforce expanded to a  count of 70+ employees growing to something bigger. Set up a well-equipped workspace and developed a new culture of empathy and affection through social services.

timeline4.timelineDescription: Over the course of time, our team expanded to 150+ employees. The company made an important change by entering into different zones developing a new workspace and leveraging workforce. We started making changes to our normal path by utilizing advanced technologies.

timeline5.timelineDescription: A big step towards the future. Rebranded ourselves along with extension of office premises. Rejuvenated the look, keeping the same service and quality. We are ready for bigger clients & projects!

timeline6.timelineDescription: We were ISO 27001: 2013 certified embarking our responsibility towards data security. The month was also the occasion of completing 3rd successful year.

communities.communitiesDescription: We change the way people feel about work life through our friendly and family atmosphere.

worklife.worklifeDescription1: Work culture is the base foundation of our success. At Infolks, we follow a family concept which is rare to see in many companies. In such a hostile environment we offer our members better salary packages and flexibility which makes it easy for them to find a balance in their work and life. We are an organization that takes pride in its young work-force. Such a workforce is made possible by providing a great platform to freshers and youngsters, and make them excellent professionals by offering a wide horizon to grow and develop their skill.
worklife.worklifeDescription2: Occasional events are the next better thing at INFOLKS. Ranging from regional holidays to international days are celebrated for upkeeping the morale of employees. Apart from these common days we also have Infolks exclusive days and celebrations like Quality Day and INFIESTA. Quality day is conducted on the first of every month to honour the quality skills of employees and INFIESTA is our annual celebration. Despite celebrations we also keep up the morale of employees through reduced work loads. For this Infolks follows international standards while formulating working hours. Here our members need to work for only 7 hours a day compared to the regional standards, making the opportunities at Infolks high rated.
worklife.worklifeDescription3: We are very transparent in terms of hiring policies, financials, vision and our social responsibilities. Good work culture, pleasing company management, stress-free environment, Insurance for you and your dependents and best salary package makes Infolks an exciting place to work

social.socialDescription: We strongly believe that we hold a huge responsibility towards our society and make someone’s dream come true. With around 350 young and energetic employees, especially from rural areas, we are still working to achieve the goals of our vision. In addition Infolks has taken over 20 families over the past 3 years with a clear guidance from our charity council. The ultimate aim of Infolks is to bring rural development, empower communities, and end poverty. This divine effort and fruitful dedication towards the community help Infolks look after many indigent families especially by providing victuals.We do not consider this as a charity. It's simply just a knock to the future!

ourTeam.ourTeamDescription: Get to know the industrious management who fuel Infolks!

ourDirectors.ourDirectorsDescription: Mr. Mujeeb Kolasseri is a dreamer, a visionary and a strategist who laid the stepping stone of Infolks. Started the journey as an entrepreneur in the year 2016 by focusing on image annotation and machine learning techniques. Within 4 years of service, he has built his own empire in the field of data labeling and has this unique ability to attract the best talent, and engage with them to create global leadership teams which can drive Infolks to its next level.

career.careerDescription: Infolks is an Indian based outsourcing platform majored in data labeling services. We look forward to working with energetic people who seek greater meaning in their work and want to use their talents in the right way. Infolks offers a wide range of job opportunities for both freshers and experienced ones. Once joined, you become part of a collaborative organization where your unity, communication, teamwork, and responsibility is valued. We welcome you to work in an enjoyable and a flexible work environment. Choose your right passion, apply here and explore your future with no limits.

software.softwareShortDescription: Advance your business with our IT solutions.
software.softwareDescription: Infolks is a global software development company with immense niche expertise and focus on the latest technologies. We provide world‑class services through our reliable, and trusted team specialized in web designing and android/software development offering a fully-optimized solution for all your software and digital marketing needs.
